title: Lets play a little game
body:

replies.body:
Nami, Quinn, Xin.

Well Nami's is useless since I don't cast stuff.

I do have a bird that flies down and makes Zombies more likely to die, and apparently I don't care about their armor.

.... Probably gonna die.
Can i take valor off you when you're dead?

Jinx passive , cho passive and syndra's Q 
Well i could kill a lot of stuff with mah ballz and then heal and run like a maniac , i think i could survive the apocalipse
I Added abilitys give it another go :3

> [{quoted}](name=Vayne Want A Hug,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lbpykTol,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-04-24T16:08:49.486+0000)
>
> I Added abilitys give it another go :3

#I AM AN ANTI-MAGE HYPER-CARRY NIGHTMARE WITH ABSURD AOE AND SINGLE TARGET DAMAGE. I AM A GOD.
http://new2.fjcdn.com/comments/I+m+commander+shepard+and+thiassuming+direct+control+_6eb15c45a1e7c0a9ae02775b3a7507f0.png

OH GOD, HE'S ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL! OPEN FIRE!!
https://laughingthroughthepain.files.wordpress.com/2011/03/crazy-cat.gif
_Saves it for future reference_
XERATH IS THAT YOU?!
Nunu Ryze and Morg, if i get only their passives, they all only help me if i can cast spells. I can't cast spells, so i wouldn't even notice if i had their passives in a zombie apocalypse.
RIP partypanda12 u will be missed
186, 95, 94. Welp, I'm dead.

{{champion:25}}'s Dark binding??? i don't know, run through a hall and bind the first zombie, the other zombies won't be able to get through
 {{champion:44}} 's passive??? do more damage on AA resets on dark binding baby!
{{champion:91}} 's passive??? smack that guy all the harder because of morg Q...
I don't know, save the world 1 zombie at a time.

{{champion:17}} ,{{champion:154}} and {{champion:7}}
With teemo's passive alone I think could survive, and if i do start getting eaten, i just explode into a bunch of chunks crawling towards each other.
you splode into blobs with mirror blob's, that just blob-tastic!

I feel sorry for who ever rolls
{{champion:30}} passive
{{champion:96}} passive
{{champion:14}} passive
Especially since he has no spells, so Kathus's is useless.
I might go down, but I'm taking you all with me

Janna's Q
Jayce's W
Darius's

well i can knock them up, sprint for a short while and make them bleed. 
i will miss you guys.
I don't know, Summoners rift doesn't have ceilings and if you see how high those guys go, i imagine in like a hallway you'd kill alot of infected.
Hecarim's Passive, Kha'Zix's Passive, and Corki's passive... I'd be  pretty damn deadly and subtle I'll say.

WHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAT I never knew that THAT was corki's passive O.o
so you get bonus's from running really fast and killing single people... bruh at this point i don't recommend attempting to kill zombie's just kill other survivors and loot them

I got {{champion:25}} passive, {{champion:14}} 's passive and {{champion:103}} E.

I'm killing myself, I just become a Zombie already..

168 (Katarina W) 222 (Trundle E) 182 (Maokai E)
Hmm I guess I would stop them with huge pillars and lots of sapplings slowing them down 
And well tearing them to shreds with blades and getting a speed boost somehow when and if they got close to me...

Ehh I guess I could manage

Morg Q
Warwick E
Varus E

Not bad. I'll know where the zombies are (Since they're dead I figure they're low on HP) and can keep them off of me.
Sej Q, Nid Q, Evelynn passive.  They can't find me, I can dash through walls (like a boss), and can nuke them from orbit.  I think it's time for some zombie killing!
{{champion:222}} , {{champion:34}} and {{champion:143}} . Hopefully Jinx won't go crazy and turn on us. But a lot of damage for killing zombies c:

{{champion:236}} Passive
{{champion:412}}  Passive
{{champion:98}}  E

Early on, I use my dash to escape zombies and proc the Lucian passive for a double-tap.  After killing many zombies and devouring their souls, I'll be tanky enough to safely use the taunt to save friends by taunting zombies.  Eventually I'll rack up enough AP that I can explode zombies just be running through them.  Oh, and I can walk through walls on a short cooldown.  Awesome.

Zilean Q, Galio W and Gnar Passive...
So, I can turn into a giant monster for close combat when I gone mad. While having time bombs to throw around and can get a shield that will constantly heal me...
I might live actually :D

221 Tristana's W
60 Master Yi's Passive
57 Malphite's Passive

So I am basically Master Chief

I hate this sometimes, i find that i actually DON'T KNOW the passives of most of the champions O.o
Yeah, basically master chief, i actually think you have a good shot for this!
Bruh... I'm Master Chief.  If Chief can withstand the Flood, which are definitely more diabolical and virulent than zombies, I can definitely kill some slow zombies that cannot use guns.
Fair enough

{{champion:56}} 's w 
{{champion:80}} 's passive 
and 
{{champion:16}} ' Q 

when i get horded i'll fear some of them 
when i get attacked in the back my shield will save me 
and i'll always be healing while dealing aoe damage to them especially since they can't dodge ^_^
actually...without her w you won't get healed by her q, and her q sucks alone.  ah well, at least it's AOE :P
i had hopes -_- !

I got 28, 78, 99

First is gangplank i got oranges that cures everything including zombie bites plus a long range pistol and i can slow them with my attacks and run faster. Just having this alone would be enough to survive but ill just take his oranges.

Second i got rengar with his passive alone i could easily jump over all the zombies whenever they try to attack me when i am in the woods and other bushes then kill them. 

Last is trundle ill take his wall to block of big herds of them. 

So my legendary combo or oranges to never get infected and always be a healing, super jump to get kills easily from surprise area, and a wall to block them off where i want them no brainier be easy to survive
I got Azir Passive, Nocturne Passive and Tryndamere. Now if Azir's tower procs  Tryndamere's passive and Nocturne's Passive I'll be fine. At least until the Sun Disc dies.

Irelia, Ezreals Q, and leonas Q

Leona can shield everyone.

Warwick E means I'll never be snuck up on (I figure zombies, being dead, would perpetually have low health), and then Kayle E and Malzahar W means ranged attacks and AoE to keep me safe. I think I'd be alright.
Annie's passive, Malz's W, and Urgot's Q. I think I'll be fine.

I have Aatrox's Q, Tryndamere's Q, and Azir's E. I'm pretty much set with the healing + clutch factor from Tryndamere, I can quickly jump away to any of my friends, and I can fly into battle or out of it when needed.

I think I win.

{{champion:429}} Passive
{{champion:122}} Q
{{champion:38}} W

I like it- my Q is great i can just chop down all the zombies around me if i get surrounded,  Kalistas passive will help me dodge the zombies then that mixed with Kassadins W will give me extra damage to cut down them zambies faster

{{champion:22}} passive {{champion:18}} passive {{champion:1}} Q

My first shot will hurt a lot, and will increase in range over time. I also have the ability to throw fire. I think I'd be fine.

{{champion:84}} passive {{champion:43}} Q and {{champion:41}} passive

So I could heal myself when use my amazingly magical spiral of death. and poison the zombies and slow them with my basic attacks...
I think I would survive! :D
Oh yay! I'd say I'll live for about 5 minutes.  I got rumbles passive, Anivias e, and xinzhaos w...  Just what I need to boost that rumble passive!
I got syndras ball throwing, healing bloodlust, zyras passive, and renekton dash. Unfortunatly, zyras passive is usless because it activiates when i failed the challenge.

Rolled:
{{champion:80}} passive
{{champion:134}} q
{{champion:119}} passive

I will rock the zombie apocalypse. Low cooldown aoe zombie slayer q that gives me basically infinite blocking, all the while building stacks of adoration so I can get filthy rich and hire mercenaries to help me out.
